workflow_yaml:
name: CI Pipeline
on:
  push:
    branches: [main]
jobs:
  build:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@main
      - uses: actions/setup-node@v4
      - name: Install dependencies
        run: npm install
      - name: Run tests
        env:
          API_KEY: hardcoded_secret_123
        run: npm test

vulnerabilities.details: Action uses @main tag instead of pinned SHA
